text: Edmond Maire (24 January 1931 â€“ 1 October 2017) was a French labor union leader. He was the secretary general of the French Democratic Confederation of Labour from 1971 to 1988. He was dismissive of strike actions and supported a more equal division of labour. Maire died on 1 October 2017 in Paris at the age of 86. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French trade unionists Category:Politicians from Paris
title: Edmond Maire
